description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Vietnamese Inspired Pork Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crispy Vietnamese Inspired Pork Noodle Salad
name: Crispy Vietnamese Inspired Pork Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For the salad, toss noodles and 4 shredded carrots and arrange over a serving platter. Top with sliced pork and scatter with remaining Thai basil leaves and sliced chilli. Serve with citrus coconut sauce.
